posts.name: Angel Falls Coffee Company
posts.note: Angel Falls Coffee Company is a coffeehouse offering carefully sourced java and tea, plus baked goods and a full lunch menu most days. I ordered their large hot chocolate with whipped cream all for $2.08 with tax. Such a steal. While sitting here, catching up on e-mail, I heard one of the workers tell a customer they had 50 hot teas and three cold teas.

posts.name: Crave
posts.note: Crave serves a diverse menu with global influences is presented in a colorful, contemporary, art-filled setting.

posts.name: Downtown 140
posts.note: Downtown 140 is an adventurous New American dishes are presented in a romantic, subterranean, brick-walled setting. If they have it on special order the sea bass wrapped in prosciutto with clam broth, wild mushrooms, and fennel salad or the pork charcuterie board or the escargot covered in puff pastry to seal in the garlic and cream sauce. NOTE: Restaurant is downstairs.

posts.name: The Eye Opener
posts.note: The Eye Opener is a warm and comfortable diner serving classic American breakfast, omelettes, and specialty sandwiches. You should order their home-made breakfast sausages with your breakfast. It's not loud so you can have a nice conversation with others and not have to strain to hear.

posts.name: The Mustard Seed Market and Cafe
posts.note: The Mustard Seed Market and Cafe is Akron’s original healthy restaurant that features all natural and organic ingredients, made fresh to order and served with a smile! Our forward-thinking menu offers a wide variety of Gluten Free friendly, Hormone and Anti-biotic free Meats, Vegetarian, Vegan and Allergen-Friendly cuisine inspired from around the world. We ordered the Buffalo cauliflower which is lightly battered cauliflower fried and covered in spicy sauce served with a side or two of blue cheese dressing.  You should also order one of their bowls that have chopped mixed veggies, nuts, meat if you want. You can create and combine what you want.

posts.name: Nervous Dog Coffee Bar
posts.note: Nervous Dog Coffee Bar is a relaxed coffeehouse serving hot drinks and sandwiches in a casual, quirky atmosphere. It's a great little place to relax, read, and get some work done with comfortable seating.

posts.name: O'Neil House Bed and Breakfast
posts.note: The O’Neil House Bed and Breakfast is one of Akron's unique jewels. Located in the heart of West Akron at the major intersection of West Exchange Street and Mull Avenue, the 19-room Tudor mansion is an architectural treasure sitting on six parcels of park-like land. They serve a wonderful breakfast with fresh fruits, a pastry, and an omelette. The room I stayed in has chairs in it but also had another sitting room with a sofa, table and two chairs, a small TV and two walls of windows.
